+  function doSearch(event, query, newTab) {
+    var url;
+    if (query !== undefined) {
+      url = '/search?q=' + encodeURIComponent(query) + '&repo=' + encodeURIComponent(initData.repo_info.name);
+    } else {
+      url = '/search';
+    }
+    if (newTab === true){
+      window.open(url);
+    } else {
+      window.location.href = url
+    }
+  }
+
